abilities.name: Astartes Banner
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.name: Deeds of Heroism
abilities.rule: Once per battle, when this model is selected to fight, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in this model’s unit.
